flawed_nl_solution:
Last year he had 39 cows - 25 cows - 6 cows = <<39-25-6=8>>8 cows.
This year after the number of the cows has increased he has 8 cows + 24 cows = <<8+24=29>>29 cows.
After he bought more cows he now has 29 cows + 43 cows = <<29+43=72>>72 cows.
After his friend gave him cows he now has 72 cows + 8 cows = <<72+8=80>>80 cows.
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 29. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
